text: Hathras is a city in Hathras district, in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is the headquarters of the Hathras district that was created on 3 May 1997, by incorporating parts of: Aligarh, Mathura, Agra Districts, and Khair Tehsil. It forms a part of Aligarh Division. == References == Category:Cities in Uttar Pradesh
title: Hathras
